creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Crosby in memory of Mrs. Albert W. Hastings
description: chamber stick, rare, with spherical chimney; the base of the stick has a hollow space to hold the wax taper, and is decorated with gadrooning around the rim; thumb piece of handle is also decorated with gadrooning; the chimney fits over the wick stand, and by turning a trifle clamps to a projection on the rim; cap snuffer with ring handle
medium: Sheffield plate (silver fused to copper), glass
title: Chamber stick with chimney
